text: aur (vah vakt yaad karo) jab hamane tumase ahad liya aur (qohe) toor ko (tumhaaree udoole hukmee se) tumhaare sar par latakaaya aur (hamane kaha ki ye kitaab tauret) jo hamane dee hai mazabootee se lie raho aur (jo kuchh usamen hai) suno to kahane lage suna to (sahee lekin) ham isako maanate nahin aur unakee beeemaanee kee vajah se (goya) bachhade kee ulafat ghol ke unake dilon mein pila dee gaee (ai rasool) un logon se kah do ki agar tum eemaanadaar the to tumako tumhaara eemaan kya hee bura hukm karata tha
